caption:
Work friends are support systems, break partners, comic relief, and confidants.

Working with a friend can also make a hard shift better.

Today, we officially launch Work with Friends, a new feature that allows connectors to sign up for shifts – together – and be a powerful unit onsite.

Over the past year, our connectors have shared pictures of their “work buddies” with our community. We celebrate these friendships and the bonds being made, shift by shift.

These connections represent what makes working in healthcare a little easier.

#nurseinspired #bettertogether #workwithfriends
